mapper.select: select seq, social_id, member_name, profile_image, birthday, birth_year, birth_time, (select ifnull(format(sum(point_amount), 0), 0) from point_history where user_seq = #{seq} and point_type = 0) as point, (select count(seq) from coupon_history where user_seq = #{seq}) as coupon, gender, phone from member where seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: update member set phone = #{phone}, birth_time = #{birthTime} where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select ph.seq, (select ifnull(format(sum(point_amount), 0), 0) from point_history where user_seq = #{seq} and point_type = 0) as point, (select store_name from store s where s.seq = ph.store_seq) as storeName, reason, point_amount, ph.created_at from point_history ph inner join member m on ph.user_seq = m.seq where user_seq = #{seq}
